item.title: Steven add a quote by Rebecca Wells
item.description: "Smoke, drink and never think." -- Rebecca Wells

item.title: Steven add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Steven add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Steven add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Steven add a quote by John Steinbeck
item.description: "Try to understand men. If you understand each other you will be kind to each other. Knowing a man well never leads to hate and almost always leads to love." -- John Steinbeck

item.title: Steven add a quote by Rebecca Wells
item.description: "She used to say she could taste sleep and that it was as delicious as a BLT on fresh French bread." -- Rebecca Wells

item.title: Steven add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Steven add a quote by Rebecca Wells
item.description: "His tall, lanky body had the wrinkles of sleep, and he smelled like cotton and dreams." -- Rebecca Wells

item.title: Steven add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Steven add a quote by Rebecca Wells
item.description: "Life is short, but it is wide. Genevieve Whitman taught me that." -- Rebecca Wells

item.title: Steven add a quote by Rebecca Wells
item.description: "See, she goes places when she reads. I know all about that. When I'm reading, wherever I am, I'm always somewhere else." -- Rebecca Wells

item.title: Steven add a quote by Anne Rice
item.description: "Goodnight sweet prince, may flights of devils wing you to your rest." -- Anne Rice

item.title: Steven add a quote by Augusten Burroughs
item.description: "We were young. We were bored. And the old electroshock therapy machine was just under the stairs in a box next to the Hoover." -- Augusten Burroughs

item.title: Steven add a quote by Augusten Burroughs
item.description: "My mother began to go crazy. Not in a 'Let's paint the kitchen red!' sort of way. But crazy in a 'gas oven, toothpaste sandwhich, I am God' sort of way." -- Augusten Burroughs

item.title: Steven add a quote by David Sedaris
Steven add a quote by Johann Georg Hamann
item.description: "The product of paper and printed ink, that we commonly call the book, is one of the great visible mediators between spirit and time, and, reflecting zeitgeist, lasts as long as ore and stone." -- Johann Georg Hamann

item.title: Steven add a quote by Stéphane Mallarmé
item.description: "Everything in the world exists in order to end up as a book." -- Stéphane Mallarmé

item.title: Steven add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Steven add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Steven add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Steven add a quote by H. Jackson Brown Jr.
item.description: "Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover." -- H. Jackson Brown Jr.

item.title: Steven add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Friendship is born at that moment when one man says to another: "What! You too? I thought that no one but myself . . .&#34;" -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Steven add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Always forgive your enemies; nothing annoys them so much." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Steven add a quote by Gordon A. Eadie
item.description: "If you don't stand for something you will fall for anything." -- Gordon A. Eadie

item.title: Steven add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Steven add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "The man who does not read has no advantage over the man who cannot read." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Steven add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "The person, be it gentleman or lady, who has not pleasure in a good novel, must be intolerably stupid." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Steven add a quote by Paul Terry
item.description: "Whenever I feel the need to exercise, I lie down until it goes away." -- Paul Terry

item.title: Steven add a quote by Garrison Keillor
item.description: "Anyone who thinks sitting in church can make you a Christian must also think that sitting in a garage can make you a car." -- Garrison Keillor

item.title: Steven add a quote by Thomas A. Edison
item.description: "I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work." -- Thomas A. Edison
